description: Number of steps for S(S(..S(n)..)) to converge, where S is the Kempner function A002034.
references: Henry Ibstedt, "Smarandache Iterations", Smarandache Notions Journal, (submitted), 1996.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a018194 n = 1 + length (takeWhile (/= 0) $ zipWith (-) ks $ tail ks)   where ks = iterate a002034 n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 09 2012
author: Henry Ibstedt (Glimminge 2036, 28060 Broby, Sweden)
extensions: Corrected and extended by _David W. Wilson_ May 15 1997
